gmcm.controls.trigger.deadzone.tooltip: Helps prevent accidental triggering on very sensitive or inaccurate controllers.
gmcm.controls.thumbstick.preference.tool: Choose which thumbstick controls the menu selection.
gmcm.controls.thumbstick.deadzone.toolti: Corrects for inaccuracy or drift on thumbsticks for many controllers.
gmcm.controls.activation.tooltip: Which input activates the selected item?
gmcm.inventory.max.tooltip: Maximum number of items to show in the inventory menu. Empty slots are counted against the limit, but not displayed.
gmcm.custom.link.tooltip: Choose which shortcuts will appear in the right-trigger menu.
gmcm.style.link.tooltip: Change the colors and dimensions of the menus.
gmcm.style.colors.slidernote: Colors are displayed as hex values (#rrggbb or #aarrggbb). For a better editing experience, install the 'GMCM Options' mod by Jamie Taylor.
gmcm.style.colors.inner.tooltip: Background color for the inner area showing detailed item info.
gmcm.style.colors.outer.tooltip: Background color for the ring where items/shortcuts appear.
gmcm.style.colors.highlight.tooltip: Background color for the part of the ring that is selected / about to be activated.
gmcm.style.colors.cursor.tooltip: Color of the cursor icon showing the precise stick direction.
gmcm.style.colors.title: Selection Title
gmcm.style.colors.title.tooltip: Color of the selection title displayed in large text inside the inner ring.
gmcm.style.colors.description.tooltip: Color of the selection description displayed in small text underneath the title.
gmcm.style.dimensions.note: These configure the sizes of different parts of the menu, but can't be shown in the preview above. You generally don't need to change these unless you're playing in windowed mode or have an unusual display resolution.
gmcm.style.dimensions.inner.tooltip: Radius of the inner area showing detailed item info.
gmcm.style.dimensions.outer.tooltip: Radius of the outer ring where items/shortcuts appear. This is the distance from the inside edge to the outside edge, not the radius from the menu's center.
gmcm.style.dimensions.gap.tooltip: Space between the inner circle and outer ring. This is purely an aesthetic choice and won't affect legibility.
gmcm.style.dimensions.cursor.size.toolti: Size of the cursor showing current stick direction; measured from base to tip of the triangle.
gmcm.style.dimensions.cursor.distance.to: Distance between the tip of the stick direction cursor and the edge of the ring.
gmcm.style.dimensions.itemheight.tooltip: Height of selectable icons/images displayed in the outer ring. Very wide aspect ratios may be scaled down further to fit.
gmcm.style.dimensions.selectionheight.to: Height of the icon/image of the selected item, displayed above the title in the inner ring.
